intro: Climacoptera intricata, commonly known as the spiral tangle, is a unique flowering plant characterized by its intricate, spiraling growth pattern. It belongs to the family Scrophulariaceae and is native to the mountainous regions of South America. The plant features small, tubular flowers that bloom in shades of pink and purple, often arranged in dense clusters.
